ctx: intros f g n x H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros f g n x H. induction n. - simpl. apply is_derive_unique. apply Derive_correct. apply I. - simpl. apply is_derive_unique. apply Derive_correct. apply ex_derive_n in I. apply is_derive_n_unique in I. rewrite -> I. reflexivity.
